recipesJson.name: Banana Nut - Strawberry Cheese Cake
recipesJson.author: MarkSr
recipesJson.description: I really like layered vape recipes and I try to create at least 1 a month with this being the recipe for the my month.. This is my rendition of something I had seen when I first started to D.I.Y. and I have struggled with in the beginning and I think I have the right amount of everything for the correct tastes so what better then the best of 2 worlds.. Banana Nut Bread with Strawberry Cheesecake combined into one hell of a vape.. Slight coconut hint with the right cream and vanilla.

reviews.text: Really well balanced Banana nut recipe. Thank you.
